Package Engine.Tile

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
Engine.Tile.Tile
Direct Known Subclasses:
DebugTile, EmptyTile, FloorTile, GrassTile, PowerBoxTile, SpawnTile, VoidTile, WallTile, WaterTile
public class Tile extends Object
Represents a tile in the game world.
Author:
haotian
